title: Mid-adc main LF 5v5 team
body:
I am currently looking for a 5v5 team to try push through the ranks with, I main mid and adc mostly but I can play all roles. I am currently in b1 but am slowly moving up only in bronze due to having my brother play at the start of the season. In recent season I was silver 1 but I was playing with gold/plat players
Add me on Hektik418 for more inf
